comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: All three Lebedoff triplets started at the University of Minnesota in 1956. David went to law school at Harvard; Jonathan also went to law school, at Minnesota. Judy was an English major at university, then worked as a radio producer. David is author of the recent book The Same Man: George Orwell and Evelyn Waugh in Love and War (Random House 2008). Jonathan was Chief US Magistrate Judge for the Federal District of Minnesota before he retired in 2005. www.davidlebedoff.com/ www.jlebedoff.com/
